name: Cinnamon Sugared Pecans
author: Erin
summary: My grandma makes these every year for the holidays. It's always handy to make extra for later snacking! They are relatively quick and easy to make and taste wonderful. I love the smell of these when they're in the oven.
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Beat egg white in a large bowl with an electric mixer until frothy
Add pecans to egg white and stir until evenly coated
Mix sugar, cinnamon, and salt together in a separate bowl; add to pecans and stir until coated
Spread coated pecans onto a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until fragrant and crisp, about 25 minutes
